messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] question for anyone in SC
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Tracy, I am in SC. If you are a current member of an accountability group you shouldn t need to wait for a letter. My advice is to call your group. Here is
messages.messageBody:
Hi Tracy,

I am in SC. If you are a current member of an accountability group you
shouldn't need to wait for a letter. My advice is to call your group. Here is a
great link about the laws and what to do when pulling your kid out of SC schools.
It isn't an unschooling site, but a SC homeschoolers one.

_http://www.chasesc.com/withdrawal.html_
(http://www.chasesc.com/withdrawal.html)

If you have any more questions, feel free to email me offlist.
_cudltot@..._ (mailto:cudltot@...)


Chrissy
<BR><BR><BR>**************************************<BR> AOL now offers free
email to everyone. Find out more about what's free from AOL at
http://www.aol.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] question for anyone in SC
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: TWAGNER3@sc.rr.com If i want to pull my kind out and I am already a member in an assoc. do i need to wait for a new letter or not. The reason I ask
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: TWAGNER3@...

If i want to pull my kind out and I am already a member in an assoc.
do
i need to wait for a new letter or not. The reason I ask is that she
cannot miss anymore days without Dr excuse. I want to get her out ASAP,
but want to make sure she's legal as a homeschooler before doing so.
tracy j wagner

-=-=-=-

Tracy,

THis is a national unschooling list. Maybe you should log onto the
yahoo list for unschoolers in SC?

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/schoolsoutsupport
Subscribe: schoolsoutsupport-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

Which accountability asociation are you a member of? SOS is also an
accountability assocication (that I run) and is specifically FOR
unschoolers. Not all members ARE unschoolers, but that is what it was
formed for.

You may contact me off-list or by phone 803 776 4849 land or 803 237
4948 cell if you'd like more info.


~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

messages.messageBody:
If i want to pull my kind out and I am already a member in an assoc. do
i need to wait for a new letter or not. The reason I ask is that she
cannot miss anymore days without Dr excuse. I want to get her out ASAP,
but want to make sure she's legal as a homeschooler before doing so.
tracy j wagner
